misuses.misuse: CWE-327: Use of a Broken or Risky Cryptographic Algorithm.
misuses.description: The use of the 'IDEA' encryption algorithm is considered broken and should not be used. It has been shown to be vulnerable to attacks and should be replaced with a more secure algorithm.
misuses.recommendation: Replace the use of the 'IDEA' encryption algorithm with a more secure algorithm such as AES or RSA.
